channel.title: Carpentry at the University of Oslo
channel.description: Recent content on Carpentry at the University of Oslo

item.description: Book Club # Our Book Club meets quaterly to discuss on a book we have previously chosen. We also gather a list of books on pedagody, teaching practices, personal development. Feel free to suggest books either for personal reading or for group discussions. Suggest a book Previous Bookclubs # Teaching Tech Together, Greg Wilson
